name: Secret Box
rules: You can't have more than 1 ACE SPEC card in your deck.

You can use this card only if you discard 3 other cards from your hand.    Search your deck for an Item card, a Pok√©mon Tool card, a Supporter card, and a Stadium card, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.
ACE SPEC: You can't have more than 1 ACE SPEC card in your deck.
